segments.text: I notice the warm light coming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman looks content, polishing that dish with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But water is pouring out of the sink like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's ankle-deep in it, yet totally unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that little stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, like an adventurer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting back, though; that's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's kind of cute how they're teaming up for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is lovely, all green and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a mix of sweet and scary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hopefully, it all ends with just soggy feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies look delicious from here.
segments.speaker: PAR
